programme.desc: Contestants are surprised when someone might just be given a second chance to keep their dreams alive.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: Former teammates turn opponents in an Elimination Challenge that brings new meaning to "up and down."

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: Contestants play golf's version of a favorite schoolyard basketball game and learn why pin-high can be the best shot.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The final four competitors square off in match play and one player makes the best of a second opportunity to avoid elimination.

programme.title: The Big Break

programme.title: The Big Break

programme.title: Golf Channel Academy
programme.desc: Two-time major champion Zach Johnson showcases his very best iron and driver instruction and offers advice on how to improve your wedge play by working on a consistent ball flight and trajectory.

programme.title: Golf Channel Academy

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake teaches setup changes, swing adjustments and creative drills to stop a slice; learn how a sleeping bag, starter pistol, towel and wall can all be used to turn a slice into a powerful draw.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Learn how to improve upper body mobility to prevent coming over the top, increase lower body stability to stop swaying and build full body strength to maximize distance.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Learn how petting a dog can improve a swing path and how giving a high five will help control a club face.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Use a lawnmower to improve a backswing, a paper towel roll to train better arm structure and a hammer to hammer the longest drives.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Learn how pickleball can improve shop shaping, how to make the knees kiss for better contact and how to crush the driver like Tony Finau.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: How to play the key shots in The Open at Royal St. Georges. Learn how to avoid trouble right off the tee, stick approach shots to elevated greens, and scramble from deep greenside bunkers. A detailed swing analysis of 2019 Open Champion Shane Lowry.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach the shots made famous by Open Champions at St. Andrews. Learn how to hit powerful draws like Tiger Woods, escape the rough like Seve Ballesteros, and stick wedges like John Daly.

programme.desc: A journey to explore golf's leading teachers, players and influencers.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris and Randy dive into golf swing technique and discuss things such as ball position and club path that can help amateur golfers of any handicap.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: A journey to explore golf's leading teachers, players and influencers.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris and Biomechanics professor, Dr. Young-Hoo Kwon address what can be learned from analyzing the biomechanics of the golf swing.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: A journey to explore golf's leading teachers, players and influencers.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Todd presents the structure of his teaching, taking Chris all the way from developing a correct motion, to ways to implement on-course pressure into practice.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como travels to the Athletic Motion Golf Warehouse in Cartersville, GA where he joins the brains behind AMG, Mike Granato and Shaun Webb.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Scott Hamilton presents his analytical yet simple teaching style, and brings in a couple of his students to show how he molded their swings.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como is in Celebration, Florida where he joins John Montgomery, golf social media extraordinaire.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como is in Lake Mary, Florida at the headquarters of Top Speed Golf along with its co-founder, Clay Ballard.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.sub-title: Dr. Gio Valiante's Mental Game Blueprint
programme.desc: Chris Como is joined by some of the best in the golf psychology game, Dr. Gio Valiante and Ina Kim-Schaad, at Hawk's Landing Golf Club in Orlando, Florida.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.sub-title: Dr. Rob Neal's Wedge Play Mastery
programme.desc: Chris Como is in Orlando, Florida at Orange Lake Resort where he is talking short game with Dr. Rob Neal and Layne Savoie.

programme.title: GolfPass Top Tips
programme.desc: Gain distance and find more fairways with this collection of driving tips from world-class GolfPass instructors.

programme.title: GolfPass Top Tips
programme.desc: The top tips from the world's best teacher have been compiled to make you a better ball striker; Nathalie Sheehan reveals how to eliminate fat contact, Chris Como teaches his Statue of Liberty Drill and Martin Hall goes in-depth.

programme.title: GolfPass Top Tips
programme.desc: The top tips from the world's best teachers have been compiled to improve your short game; Devan Bonebrake reveals how to make perfect chipping contact, Aimee Cho teaches how a towel can improve your pitch shots and Martin Hall featured.

programme.title: GolfPass Top Tips
programme.desc: The top tips from the world's best teachers have been compiled to improve your short game; Devan Bonebrake reveals how to make perfect chipping contact, Aimee Cho teaches how a towel can improve your pitch shots and Martin Hall featured.

programme.title: GolfPass Top Tips
programme.desc: Putting technique and strategy lends itself to personal preference more than any other aspect of the game.

programme.title: 3 Keys to Every Shot
programme.desc: Nick Dougherty analyzes the swings of Rory McIlroy, Collin Morikawa and Jon Rahm to teach the three keys to a variety of challenging golf shots.

programme.title: 3 Keys to Every Shot
programme.desc: Learn how to hit shots into the wind, hit low fades with irons and dial in distance on awkward 50-yard pitch shots.
